caption.p: a Schematic of zinc–air battery. b Open cell voltage (OCV) of two-connected Zn–air battery. c Specific discharging capacities at 20 mA cm −2. d Discharging polarization and power density curves based on the Co-N 4/NC and Pt/C-Ru/C catalyst. e Cycling test (100 cycles) at a current density of 10 mA cm −2 with Co-N 4/NC and Pt/C-Ru/C catalyst. f Images of two homemade rechargeable Zn–air batteries in series with a LED
